doc.title: Phraw rak khrap phom
doc.plot: Match Point is a story about love, volleyball, and competition between Sand, an ordinary Thai guy who's the leader of a gang in Pattaya, and Net, a pretty rich girl who's also a competitive beach volleyball player. Sand falls for Net and tries to win her heart. Net is attracted to her handsome young coach (Pete) whom she idolizes. With a major volleyball match coming up, Net has to face her biggest rival, Reiko, a Japanese-Thai beach volleyball champion. This big match culminates in a major chance for Sand to prove his true love.
